CmdLine: rpm --rebuilddb && yum update -y &&   yum install -y ImageMagick-devel libxml2 libxml2-devel libxml2-python libxslt libxslt-devel python-devel gcc &&   easy_install Wand &&   easy_install gunicorn &&   easy_install lxml &&   yum remove -y gcc libxslt-devel python-devel libxml2-devel &&   yum autoremove -y &&   yum clean all && rm -rf /tmp/yum*
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: localedef -c -i en_US -f UTF-8 en_US.UTF-8 &&   mkdir -p /opt/app &&   curl -L -o /tmp/calibre-cps.tar.gz https://github.com/janeczku/calibre-web/archive/master.tar.gz &&   tar zxf /tmp/calibre-cps.tar.gz -C /opt/app --strip-components=1 &&   rm /tmp/calibre-cps.tar.gz &&   easy_install `cat /opt/app/requirements.txt` &&   chown -R www:www /opt/app
Commands.Name: run
